…Act.

Section 112 of the Clean Air Act lays out stringent compliance  standards for facilities emitting over 10 tons of a single hazardous  air pollutant, or 25 tons of an aggregate. Facilities below those  thresholds are classified as area sources and subject to more flexible  requirements.
